header_text: You have been in the same post for five years, and you are beginning to feel bored and unchallenged in your job. You would like to try for a new position, but you worry if you will be competitive on the job market.

elements.text: Thinking about your career trajectory [you do not think that your options are limited, and you believe your chances of finding a new job that you find fulfilling are...
